articles.title: WPK Delegation Meets General Secretary of C.C., CPV
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Meets General Secretary of C.C., CPV
 Hanoi, June 6 (KCNA Correspondent) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, on a visit to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam met and had a talk with Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV), at the building of the CPV Central Committee Monday.
					 Choe Thae Bok said that the Seventh Congress of the WPK elected supreme leader Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK reflecting the unanimous will and desire of all party members, service personnel and other people.
					
					 Choe noted that under his wise guidance the service personnel and other people of the DPRK turned out as one in the drive for implementing the decision made at the Party Congress, referring to the constant efforts made by the WPK and the DPRK government for defending peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 Congratulating Nguyen Phu Trong on the successful 12th Congress of the CPV and his reelection as general secretary, Choe wished the party and people of Vietnam greater success in the work for building rich and powerful socialist Vietnam by carrying out the decision made at the party congress.
					
					 He expressed the principled stand of the WPK to develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties, countries and peoples which were provided and cultivated by the preceding leaders of the DPRK and Vietnam with much care and to which the top leaders of the two countries are now paying deep attention.
					
					 Nguyen Phu Trong warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un once again on his election as chairman of the WPK and its successful Seventh Congress.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, dispatched a high-ranking party delegation to have his verbal message conveyed, a clear proof of the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and two countries.
					
					 Noting that the friendly relations between Vietnam and the DPRK provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung have developed on good terms under the deep concern of the leaders of the two countries through generations, he stressed it is the steadfast stand of the party, government and people of Vietnam to consolidate the friendly and cooperative relations with the party, government and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He extended full support to the fraternal Korean people in their efforts to achieve socio-economic development and reunify the country.

articles.title: Talks between Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK and Secretary of C.C., CPV
articles.content:
Talks between Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK and Secretary of C.C., CPV
 Hanoi, June 6 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Talks were held between Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who is leading a delegation of the WPK on a visit to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, and Tran Quoc Vuong, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV) who doubles as chairman of its Control Commission, at the building of the CPV Central Committee Monday.
					 Present there were members of the WPK delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Vietnam and members of the CPV Central Committee including the permanent vice-director of the Organizational Department and the vice-director of the Department for External Affairs.
					
					 Choe referred to the fact that the service personnel and people of the DPRK are turning out in the 200-day campaign of loyalty to carry out the decision made at the party congress with the great pride of having elected supreme leader Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 Clarifying the stand of the DPRK to make a positive contribution to defending global peace and security as a responsible nuclear weapons state, Choe underscored the need to develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and the two peoples forged in the joint struggle for socialism.
					
					 Tran Quoc Vuong warmly welcomed the WPK delegation on behalf of the CPV Central Committee and expressed belief that the fraternal Korean people would certainly implement the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il under the guidance of Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The party and people of Vietnam would invariably support the party and people of the DPRK in their just cause to protect the security and sovereignty of the country and socialism and reunify the country, he stressed.
					
					 The WPK delegation was invited to the reception hosted by the CPV Central Committee on the same day.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Arrives in Vientiane
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Arrives in Vientiane
 Vientiane, June 6 (KCNA Correspondent) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, arrived in Vientiane to visit the Lao People's Democratic Republic on Monday.
					 Meanwhile, the WPK delegation left Hanoi after visiting the Socialist Republic of Vietnam on the same day.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Meets General Secretary of C.C., LPRP
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Meets General Secretary of C.C., LPRP
 Vientiane, June 7 (KCNA Correspondent) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) headed by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, on a visit to the Lao People's Democratic Republic (LPDR), met and had a talk with Bounnhang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) and president of the LPDR, at the building of the Central Committee of the LPRP on Tuesday.
					 Choe Thae Bok said that the Seventh Congress of the WPK elected Comrade Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK reflecting the unanimous will and desire of all the party members, service personnel and people.
					
					 In his report on the review of the work of the C.C., the WPK made at its Seventh Congress, Kim Jong Un clearly indicated the tasks and ways of accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche, Choe said.
					
					 He congratulated Bounnhang Vorachith upon his election as the president of Laos at the First Session of the 8th National Assembly of Laos, wishing the Lao party and people success in their struggle to implement the decision of the 10th Congress of the LPRP.
					
					 He expressed the invariable stand of the WPK to invariably strengthen the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the Lao party and people, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Bounnhang Vorachith extended once again warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the WPK, adding he was sincerely pleased with the successful Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 He said that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and two countries developing favorably day by day are bringing substantial interests to the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 We are always remembering the sincere support and encouragement sent by the WPK and the DPRK government and people to the Lao party, government and people in the past, he said, expressing belief that we will further develop the long-standing traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties, two states and two peoples.
					
					 The people's living standard in the DPRK is improving and the might of the socialist system is remarkably strengthened under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, he said, wishing the DPRK government and people great success in the drive for defending the country and accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					 On behalf of the LPRP, he sincerely wished Kim Jong Un who is leading the struggle of the Korean people for building a socialist power to victory good health and happiness.

articles.title: Talks Held between Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK and Secretary of C.C., LPRP
articles.content:
Talks Held between Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK and Secretary of C.C., LPRP
 Vientiane, June 7 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Talks were held between Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who is leading a delegation of the WPK on a visit to the Lao People's Democratic Republic, and Chansy Phosikham, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) and chairman of its Organization Committee, at the building of its Central Committee on Tuesday.
					 Present there were members of the WPK delegation, the DPRK ambassador to Laos, vice chief of Cabinet of the C.C., the LPRP, vice-chairman of the Committee for External Affairs, vice-chairman of the Control Committee, vice-chairman of the Commission for Propaganda and Training Affairs of the LPRP, and officials concerned.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok informed Chansy Phosikham of the Seventh Congress of the WPK and referred to the fact that the service personnel and people of the DPRK have turned out as one in the drive to carry out the decision made at the party congress, united close around Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK.
					
					 The LPRP is working hard to protect the gains of the revolution and attain the goal of socialism, Choe said, wishing the LPRP and the Lao people bigger successes in their work to carry out the decision of the 10th Congress of the LPRP.
					
					 Noting that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation provided by the preceding leaders of the DPRK and Laos are favorably developing as the days go by under the deep care of the supreme leaders of the two countries, Choe underscored the need to further strengthen unity and solidarity between the two parties and the two peoples in the joint struggle for realizing the cause of socialism.
					
					 Chansy Phosikham warmly welcomed the WPK delegation on a visit to Laos at the special instruction of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, sincerely congratulating the successful Seventh Congress of the WPK and the WPK and the DPRK government and people upon their great progress in the work for the country's socio-economic development.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would carry out the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the WPK and thus build a prosperous socialist power at an early date under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, successor to the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said that the Lao party and people will always express full support for the WPK and the Korean people in their just cause to foil the imperialists' moves against socialism, advance the socialist cause and achieve national reunification independently.
					
					 The WPK delegation was invited to the reception given by the Central Committee of the LPRP on the same day.

articles.title: City Rallies Vow to Become Victors in 200-day Campaign
articles.content:
City Rallies Vow to Become Victors in 200-day Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- There took place mass rallies in Nampho and Rason cities on Tuesday to vow to successfully implement the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and become honorable victors in the 200-day campaign.
					 Present there were officials of the local party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, working people and youths and students.
					
					 Reports were made there to be followed by speeches of the representatives of workers, agricultural workers, intellectuals, youth and students.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that the 200-day campaign is the one of loyalty to make a breakthrough in carrying out the five-year strategy for the state economic development through the might of self-reliance and self-development in all fields and units in hearty response to the decision of the Party Congress. 
					
					 They underscored the need to bolster up independence and Juche character of national economy in every way by relying on our efforts, technology and resources on the self-development-first principle, work out the plan to implement the five-year strategy for the state economic development and wage a dynamic struggle for realizing it.
					
					 They called upon all people to become honorable victors again in the 200-day campaign of loyalty for thoroughly implementing the decision advanced at the Party Seventh Congress.
					
					 The rallies were followed by demonstrations.

articles.title: Pyongyang Sports Apparatus Factory Goes Operational
articles.content:
Pyongyang Sports Apparatus Factory Goes Operational
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Sports Apparatus Factory was rebuilt in the DPRK.
					 The completion of the factory made it possible to smoothly produce and supply with indigenous efforts, technology and materials various kinds of sports apparatuses for developing specialized sports field and popularizing physical culture and sports and making them part of their life.
					
					 The factory went operational with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned, soldier builders who participated in the construction of the factory, scientists and technicians, and officials and employees of the factory.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, made an inaugural speech.
					
					 He said the factory which developed under the warm care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il has been rebuilt into a base for the production of sports apparatuses suited to the age of knowledge-based economy under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Marshal chose the site of the factory in the best place, guided its layout and sent soldier builders to undertake the project, the speaker noted, adding that the Marshal was so kind as to settle issues arising in the construction.
					
					 He called for accelerating the construction of a sports powerhouse to carry out the important tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and thus making positive contribution to glorifying the dignity and honor of Juche Korea before the world under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the factory.

articles.title: State Commendations Awarded to Crewmen of DPRK
articles.content:
State Commendations Awarded to Crewmen of DPRK
 Jungsan, June 7 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to crewmen of Fishing Boat 1728  of the Second Fleet of the Kamapho Fishery Station under the South Phyongan Provincial Fishery Management Bureau with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					 The crewmen of the boat overfulfilled their fishing plan every year and gave full play to the spirit of devotedly defending the leader when it was sunk by sea storm in the period of the 70-day campaign.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Pak Thae Song, chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kang Hyong Bong, chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, and officials and employees of the fishery station and bereaved families.
					
					 The title of Labor Hero of the DPRK and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class conferred upon Hong Song Gwan, former captain of Fishing Boat 1728 were conveyed to his bereaved family.
					
					 Order of National Flag Second Class awarded to former deputy captain Kang Chol Nam, former chief engineer O Chun Il, former fishermen Kim Sung Bom, Choe Yong Nam, Choe Ki Dok, Kim Chol Un and Choe Tong Phil was also conveyed to their bereaved families.
					
					 The bereaved families and the manager of the fishery station in their speeches said that Marshal Kim Jong Un highly praised the deeds of the ordinary fishermen and made sure that they are known throughout the country and always remembered by people.
					
					 They vowed to deeply trust and follow the Workers' Party of Korea only and devote themselves to the struggle for attaining the goals of the 200-day campaign of the station by learning from the spirit displayed by their husbands and bring up their children as true loyalists of the party.

articles.title: Sports Contest of Students of Schools of Orphans Held
articles.content:
Sports Contest of Students of Schools of Orphans Held
 Wonsan, June 7 (KCNA) -- A sports contest of the students of schools of orphans across the country was held in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province on Monday and Tuesday.
					 It was watched by Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Han Sang Jun, chairman of the Kangwon Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned and students of schools of orphans in the city.
					
					 The students selected from the schools of orphans across the country competed in 10 events including basketball, volleyball, Ssirum (Korean wrestling) and 100m race.
					
					 They displayed their sporting techniques they have trained at the sports groups.
					
					 The Kangwon Provincial team placed first in total standings.

articles.title: National Children's Science Fictions and Models Exhibition-2016 Closes
articles.content:
National Children's Science Fictions and Models Exhibition-2016 Closes
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The National Children's Science Fictions and Models Exhibition-2016 closed with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall Tuesday. It was opened on June 3 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Korean Children's Union.
					 About 90 literary works and exhibits were highly appreciated.
					
					 Pyongyang City took the first place in team standing.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were officials of the youth league and schoolchildren.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 The members of the group laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and made a bow to them.

articles.title: New Seed-covering Material Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Seed-covering Material Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Institute of Agricultural Chemicalization under the Academy of Agricultural Science in the DPRK developed a new kind of colloidal seed-covering material.
					 They also settled the technical problems to establish the process of producing this material on an industrial basis.
					
					 The new colloidal covering material helps protect seed from underground harmful insects and ceitocybe bescens and promote the growth of crops.
					
					 This covering material raises the germination rate of seed 95 percent, the rate of exterminating underground harmful insects 85 percent and per-hectare yield 10 percent.
					
					 It has already been introduced to more than 200,000 hectares of farm fields throughout the country.

articles.title: Micro Eco-medicine Introduced
articles.content:
Minju Joson Brands U.S. as Arch Criminal Aggravating Tension
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A professor of Massachusetts Engineering College of the U.S. known as leading light in the field of missile defense system expressed his personal view on the U.S. strategy for missile defense system at a recent interview with TASS. He said that the U.S. missile defense system technology is very limited and pitiful.
					 The probability of intercepting ICBMs from the DPRK with intercepting missiles deployed in Alaska and California is zero percent and it will only create such dangerous situation as a nuclear war in the future, he added.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 As declared by the U.S. expert on missile defense system, missile defense systems deployed in Alaska and California to protect the U.S. mainland from the missile attack from the DPRK remain unfinished as they are still under development.
					
					 The U.S. government authorities are busy deploying the unfinished missile defense systems at an early date in a bid to draw Russia and China into a nuclear arms race and thus obstruct their economic growth and carry out Washington's strategy for world domination by force.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal stemming the trend of the times for reconciliation and cooperation and escalating confrontation, antagonism and tension.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once the criminal racket of blocking the onward movement of mankind for peace, development and prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Un as Great Sun of Humankind
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Un as Great Sun of Humankind
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article that the report made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at its 7th Congress serves as important guidelines which give lucid answers to the principled matters for the DPRK to solve as an independent power and a nuclear weapons state in the efforts to expand and develop its external relations with initiative and an immortal great programme for further raising the international influence of the WPK and the DPRK and ensuring its dignity and interests at the highest level.
					 The article says:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's report reflects his far-sighted plan and firm will to make sure that the DPRK, an independent power and a nuclear weapons state, leads the cause of global independence to victory as a leading player.
					
					 In his historic report he stressed that it is necessary to defend and preserve the socialist movement, develop the non-aligned movement and closely rally the parties, organizations and progressive countries that are defending independence under the banner of independence against imperialism. If they do as indicated by the report, the cause of global independence will be accelerated.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the great sun of humankind who indicates the way of accomplishing the cause of global independence and leads it to victory in the 21st century.
					
					 Thanks to him, the DPRK's international prestige and influence are rising as the days go by and the dawn of global independence is breaking despite the imperialists' desperate efforts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Ruling Forces of Getting Frantic with Anti-DPRK Propaganda for Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Ruling Forces of Getting Frantic with Anti-DPRK Propaganda for Confrontation
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean authorities let the "preparatory committee for unification" hold a "seminar on unification of Korean peninsula in 2016".
					 Minister of Unification of south Korea Hong Yong Phyo at the seminar cried out for confrontation with the DPRK, blustering that "it is not time to have dialogue" and "it is necessary to channel all efforts into sanctions".
					
					 Riff-raffs spouted a litany of invectives calling for coping with "the north's provocation and insincere peace offensive," talking such cock-and-bull story as "dismantlement of nukes first and dialogue next."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a blatant challenge to the patriotic call and peace-loving efforts of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations and an unpardonable mockery of all the Koreans' desire for the country's reunification.
					
					 The above-said seminar held by the south Korean authorities as a challenge to the DPRK's efforts for improving the inter-Korean relations is no more than premeditated moves to escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula and ratchet up the campaign to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The racket persistently kicked up by them to slander the DPRK's fair and aboveboard measures would only bring into light their true colors as the anti-reunification confrontational maniacs and precipitate the stern judgment by the era and the nation in the end.
					
					 If they imprudently turn down the offer made by the DPRK out of good faith and insist on their one-sided confrontation stand despite the opportunity given to them to change their mind, they will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Military of Challenging DPRK's Goodwill and Generosity
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Military of Challenging DPRK's Goodwill and Generosity
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- These days the south Korean military are reported to have pushed ahead with the plan to reorganize a brigade-scale unit under the Special Ops Command of the Ground Force for the mission of "beheading operation".
					 The south Korean military gangsters are pushing forward the scheme to intensify the joint rehearsal with the special force of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces while squandering enormous money on introducing special transport aircraft, helicopter and other military hardware for the "beheading operation".
					
					 They do not even hesitate to make reckless remarks that one of the core missions of the puppet air force in contingency is to "behead the supreme headquarters of the north by force".
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary terms this an unpardonable military provocation challenging the goodwill and generosity of the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean relations and open up a new chapter of the national reunification.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK is left with no other option but to settle accounts by force with those who care nothing for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and the peace on the Korean peninsula but resort to confrontation with the fellow countrymen and a war to find a way out.
					
					 As a puppy knows no fear of the tiger, it is foolish of the south Korean authorities to make desperate efforts to find a way out in confrontation with the fellow countrymen. The DPRK dismisses this as a reckless act. 
					
					 The DPRK has already declared that it is ready both for peaceful way and non-peaceful way by which it will root out the source of evils at a strike to reunify the country.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persist in the confrontation with the fellow countrymen and ignite a war against the north, going against the nation's aspiration and demand and the trend of the times, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will relentlessly annihilate the provocateurs and aggressors.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye's Farce for "International Cooperation"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye's Farce for "International Cooperation"
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye during her recent visits to African countries begged for "international cooperation" while talking about "change of the north" and "dismantlement of nuclear program".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says that her junkets disclosed once again the dirty nature of Park who hurt her fellow countrymen before any country, regardless of its stance towards her.
					
					 As unanimously commented by the south Korean public, Park is sure to be a confrontation maniac and political prostitute as she is steeped in inveterate repugnancy toward the DPRK to the marrow of her bones because she spouted out invectives hurting the fellow countrymen and inciting confrontation even overseas being keen on escalating confrontation in utter disregard of the trend of the times, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said farce for "international cooperation" frantically staged by Park to incite confrontation with the DPRK, quite contrary to the trend of the present situation and the people's mindset, would only trigger off protest and censure among all Koreans and derision and criticism from the international community.
					
					 If Park persists in provocative mud-slinging at the DPRK, adding to her crimes against the nation, she will certainly meet a miserable ruin as a confrontational maniac and traitor to the nation.
					
					 Park should remember this and had better stop running amuck.

articles.title: Prisoner of Conscience Goes on Hunger-strike in S. Korea
articles.content:
Prisoner of Conscience Goes on Hunger-strike in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on June 4 carried an editorial "Do-or-die hunger-strike of prisoner of conscience discloses oppressive dictatorship of Park Geun Hye."
					The editorial referred to the fact that ten days passed since Kim Hye Yong, member of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, started hunger-strike in demand of the withdrawal of the "security law" against the suppression by Park Geun Hye regime under the pretext of "public security."
					
					The editorial went on:
					
					Civic and public organizations of south Korea and the international community support the righteous struggle of Kim Hye Yong, demanding her early release.
					
					The Measure Committee of Civic and Public Organizations against Suppression under the Pretext of Public Security called an urgent press conference at Kwanghwamun on June 1 and expressed the will to make Kim's hunger-strike the struggle for Park Geun Hye's step-down and make every effort for the earlier release of Kim who is in critical condition.
					
					The international committee opposing suppression under the pretext of public security in the south widely imparts this problem in Europe and held a meeting in Paris on June 3 demanding immediate release of Kim Hye Yong and denouncing the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					The expedition group for peace of the Korea Solidarity conducts demonstration every day outside the White House and Koreans in the U.S. and American civic bodies join in the demonstration.

articles.title: Various Bodies of S. Korea Honor Memory of National Democratic Martyrs and Victims
articles.content:
Various Bodies of S. Korea Honor Memory of National Democratic Martyrs and Victims 
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different social standings of south Korea held an all-people meeting to honor memory of  national democratic martyrs and victims at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on June 4, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The speakers said at the meeting that what they painfully experienced under the successive dictatorial regimes was that they could not live under dictatorship even though they might sacrifice their lives.
					
					 They stressed the need to make efforts for building a new world without violence by power and capital and defend the spirit of martyrs till the day when true democracy and reunification are achieved.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants marched toward Seoul Square where there is an incense-burning altar of the worker who committed suicide shortly ago and honored his memory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Slovenian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Slovenian Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" on its website on June 3.
					 The work, published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991), deals with the inevitability of victory of socialism, solidity of our socialism, secret of its invincibility and intrinsic character of our socialism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Exploits for National Reunification Praised by British Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Exploits for National Reunification Praised by British Body
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article on its website on May 31.
					 The article said that Marshal Kim Jong Un in his report on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at its Seventh Congress referred to the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification.
					
					 Kim Il Sung laid down the Juche-based line of Korea's reunification and advanced the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation, laying a solid foundation for national independence and unity, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles, the proposal and the ten-point programme as the three charters for national reunification and set forth outstanding ideas and lines such as the five-point policy for great national unity, clearly indicating the road of reunification to be followed by the Koreans.
					
					 Thanks to his noble patriotic will and bold decision for reunification two north-south summits were held and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, guided by the idea of By Our Nation Itself were adopted and published for the first time in the history of Korean division. Those were special events that provided a historical milestone for independent reunification and opened a turning phase for Korea's reunification.
					
					 All the achievements the WPK and the Korean people made by bravely weathering the test of history and dynamically advancing the movement for national reunification are the shining victories of the outstanding idea and line of independent reunification and fair and aboveboard proposal for national reunification laid down by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a proud fruition of their indefatigable energetic guidance.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article supporting the Korean people's cause of national reunification on its website on May 26.
					 The article said:
					
					 The line and polices for national reunification clarified by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the historic 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea are evoking a lively response among the public at home and abroad.
					
					 The Korean nation has waged a strenuous movement for independent reunification, holding aloft the banner of the three charters for national reunification under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, peerless patriots and lodestars of national reunification, providing such historic milestones as the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 However, the south Korean puppet authorities are making reckless remarks going against the trend of times, turning down the goodwill and magnanimity of the DPRK and chilling the atmosphere of dialogue and improved relations.
					
					 Whether to put an end at an early date to the disgraceful history of the nation in which the Koreans have suffered pain and misfortune resulting from division due to outsiders for more than seven decades and open the door for independent reunification or not hinges on how to carry out the new line and polices for national reunification.
					
					 Difficulties and obstacles are lying in the way of Korea's reunification but all Koreans are sure to emerge victorious in the nationwide struggle for building a dignified and prosperous reunified country in Korea, upholding the Juche-based line and polices for national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un as immortal great programmes.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed in Austria
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed in Austria
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria gave a lecture on June 1 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The chairman of the committee referred in detail to the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification.
					
					 Saying that the declaration serves as a historic milestone for reunifying Korea independently and peacefully by dint of the great national unity, he urged the south Korean authorities to stop depending on outsiders any longer and come out for dialogue and negotiations for peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula and prosperity common to the Korean nation.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea led by the respected HE Kim Jong Un will surely achieve the country's reunification in line with wishes and interests of all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad, he added.

articles.title: Czech Body Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Their Unethical Crime
articles.content:
Czech Body Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Their Unethical Crime
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on June 1 condemning the south Korean puppet forces for their unethical act of alluring and abducting a group of DPRK citizens.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We bitterly denounce the hideous crime committed against citizens of the DPRK under the manipulation of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The recent terrorism is a wanton violation of the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK, an unpardonable grave politically-motivated provocation escalating tension between the north and the south and an unprecedented hideous criminal act of having mercilessly abused the rights of citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities unconditionally send back the DPRK citizens without delay.
					
					 The UN and international human rights bodies should take issue with the south Korean authorities' unethical crime and take corresponding measures for sending the DPRK citizens back to their families as early as possible.

articles.title: Korean People Will Surely Achieve National Reunification under Leadership of Kim Jong Un: Int'l Body
articles.content:
Korean People Will Surely Achieve National Reunification under Leadership of Kim Jong Un: Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted an article titled "Roots of great national unity" on its website One Corea Network on May 28.
					 Recalling in detail that President Kim Il Sung founded the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland (ARF), the first anti-Japanese national united front in Korea, on May 5, 1936, the article went on:
					
					 This helped more dynamically rally all anti-Japanese forces in Korea for the struggle for national liberation.
					
					 The ARF made a great contribution to overturning the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea and liberating it, recording a brilliant chapter in its history.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea Kim Il Sung convened the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea when the country faced a grave danger due to the U.S. imperialists' vicious moves to split the Korean nation, and aroused all political parties, groups and patriotic forces of different circles in the north and the south to the struggle for achieving independence and sovereignty and the reunification of the country.
					
					 The great HE Kim Jong Il, faithful successor to the idea and cause of the President, brought about such priceless fruition as the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The Korean people will surely achieve the country's reunification under the banner of the great national unity, holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem, just as they liberated the country, united close around Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok conversa con secretario de CC de PCV
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok conversa con secretario de CC de PCV
Hanoi, 6 de junio (corresponsal de ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 6 en la sede del Comite Central del PCV las conversaciones entre Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, quien esta de visita en la Republica Socialista de Vietnam en calidad del jefe de la delegacion del PTC, y Tran Quoc Vuong, miembro del Buro Politico, secretario del CC del Partido Comunista de Vietnam y presidente de la Comision de Control de PCV.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion los miembros de la delegacion del PTC, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Crea en Vietnam, el subjefe permanente del Departamento de Organizacion quien es miembro del CC del PCV, el subjefe del Departamento de Relaciones Exteriores y otros integrantes del CC del PCV.
					
					Choe senalo que con el gran orgullo de haber elegido al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del PTC en el VII Congreso del PTC, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos se movilizaron en la campana de 200 dias de fidelidad para materializar la resolucion adoptada en el congreso del partido.
					
					Expuso la posicion de la RPDC, responsable pais poseedor de armas nucleares, de hacer aporte activo a la defensa de la paz y la seguridad del mundo. Y destaco la necesidad de intensificar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y los dos pueblos establecidas en la lucha conjunta por el socialismo.
					
					En representacion del CC del PCV, Tran Quoc Vuong felicito calurosamente la delegacion del PTC y manifesto la conviccion de que bajo la orientacion del estimado camarada Kim Jong Un, Presidente del PTC, el hermano pueblo coreano llevara sin falta al feliz termino los legados del camarada Kim Il Sung y del camarada Kim Jong Il.
					
					Asevero que el partido y el pueblo de Vietnam apoyaran invariablemente la justa causa del partido y el pueblo coreanos por defender la seguridad, la soberania y el socialismo del pais y lograr la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Ese dia, la delegacion coreana fue invitada a la recepcion ofrecida por el CC de PCV.

articles.title: En Vientiane delegacion de PTC
articles.content:
En Vientiane delegacion de PTC 
Vientiane, 6 de junio (corresponsal de ACNC) -- La delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, dirigida por Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, llego el dia 6 a Vientiane para realizar una visita a la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					El mismo dia, la delegacion coreana partio de Hanoi tras culminar su visita a la Republica Socialista de Vietnam.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre Choe Thae Bok y Chansy Phosikham
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre Choe Thae Bok y Chansy Phosikham
Vientiane, 7 de junio (corresponsal de ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 7 en la sede del Comite Central del Partido las conversaciones entre Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, quien esta de visita en la Republica Democratica Popular Lao en calidad del jefe de la delegacion del PTC, y Chansy Phosikham, miembro del Buro Politico, secretario y presidente de la Comision de Organizacion, del CC del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion los miembros de la delegacion del PTC, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en Laos, el subjefe del Gabinete, el vicepresidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores, el vicepresidente de la Comision de Control y el vicepresidente de la Comision de Propaganda y Educacion Ideologica, del CC del PPRL, y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					Choe informo el estado de la realizacion del VII Congreso del PTC y senalo que el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, unidos firmemente en torno al Presidente del PTC, Kim Jong Un, se levantaron como un hombre en la lucha por materializar la resolucion del Congreso del PTC.
					
					Aprecio que el PPRL lucha con dinamismo por defender las conquistas de la revolucion y cumplir el objeto socialista y deseo mayores exitos en los trabajos del PPRL y el pueblo lao por materializar la resolucion del X Congreso del partido.
					
					Destaco que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion preparadas por los anteriores Lideres de Corea y Laos se desarrollan favorablemente bajo la profunda atencion de los maximos Dirigentes de los dos paises.
					
					Apunto la necesidad de fortalecer mas la unidad y la solidaridad de los dos partidos y los pueblos de dos paises en medio de la lucha conjunta por realizar la causa socialista.
					
					Chansy Phosikham dio calurosa bienvenida a la delegacion del PTC que visito Laos por el mandato especial del respetado Camarada Kim Jong Un y felicito de todo corazon la realizacion exitosa del VII Congreso de partido y al PTC, el gobierno y el pueblo de Corea que logran un gran avance en los trabajos para el desarrollo social y economico del pais.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que bajo la orientacion del Camarada Kim Jong Un, sucesor de la causa revolucionaria del camarada Kim Il Sung y el camarada Kim Jong Il, el pueblo coreano construira cuanto antes una prospera potencia socialista materializando la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Asevero que el partido y el pueblo de Laos expresaran siempre el entero apoyo a la justa causa del partido y el pueblo de Corea por llevar adelante la causa socialista y lograr de manera independiente la reunificacion de la patria frustrando las maniobras antisocialistas de los imperialistas.
					
					Ese dia, la delegacion del PTC fue invitada a la recepcion ofrecida por el CC del PPRL.

articles.title: Belicistas surcoreanos vuelven a perpetrar  violacion de frontera en zona candente
articles.content:
Belicistas surcoreanos vuelven a perpetrar  violacion de frontera en zona candente
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ACNC) -- A eso de las 4 y 30 minutos por la madrugada del dia 5, los belicistas militares titeres del Sur de Corea volvieron a infiltrar los barcos en aguas de la parte Norte del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					Los titeres infiltraron profundamente 19 barcos de pesca, que estaban anclados en el islote Yonphyong, en la parte nuestra pasando la linea de demarcacion maritima.
					
					Debido a lo cual, volvio a agravarse la situacion de la candente zona maritima del Mar Oeste.
					
					Las prensas surcoreanas transmiten que debido a esta invasion de esos barcos ejecutada bajo el "permiso de las autoridades militares" se creo una "situacion tirante" de realizarse la "captura" o el "ataque de la artilleria de costa" de las fuerzas armadas del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC). 
					
					El presente caso es la continuacion de la provocacion del barbaro canonazo artillero contra el barco de enlace del EPC cometido el dia 27 de mayo por los militares surcoreanos, y es el producto de malsana intencion de los titeres surcoreanos encaminado a inventar un incidente sensacional en esa zona maritima para causar la justa reaccion del EPC y, luego, imputarle a esta la "amenaza" y "provocacion".
					
					Lo diferente del caso es que los gangsteres de la capa militar surcoreana orquestaron directamente la anterior provocacion artillera, pero esta vez movilizaron los pescadores inocentes como carnada de la confrontacion fratricida temiendo el castigo despiadado de las fuerzas armadas del EPC.
					
					Por otra parte, otro intento verdadero del caso reside en agravar la situacion de esta zona maritima para obstaculizar el ambiente de dialogo de las relaciones intercoreanas y mantener a toda costa la ilegal y bandidesca "linea de limite al Norte".
					
					Para encubrir sus crimenes, los titeres difunden las absurdas tonterias de que sus barcos invadieron la zona maritima de la parte Norte para capturar los 2 barcos de pesca chinos que estaban en la pesca ilegal.
					
					La insistencia en que los barcos de pesca capturen otros de pesca deviene una payasada que puede ejecutar solo los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Tales tentativas encaminadas a la confrontacion fratricida pagaran sin falta el precio merecido.

articles.title: Inaugurada Fabrica de Equipos y Materiales Deportivos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Inaugurada Fabrica de Equipos y Materiales Deportivos de Pyongyang 
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ACNC) -- Se ha levantado nuevamente la Fabrica de Equipos y Materiales Deportivos de Pyongyang que producira por su propia cuenta los equipos y materiales deportivos de diversas clases necesarios a desarrollar los deportes profesionales, popularizar las actividades deportivas y convertirlas en la vida cotidiana. 
					Tuvo lugar este martes la ceremonia de inauguracion con la participacion de Choe Ryong Hae, Ro Tu Chol, el ministro de Deportes Ri Jong Mu, los funcionarios interesados, constructores militares, cientificos, tecnicos, y los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica. 
					
					La palabra de inauguracion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes.
					
					El orador dijo que la fabrica levantada y desarrollada por el gran amor del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se ha convertido en la base de produccion de equipos y materiales deportivos del pais apta a la demanda de la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Menciono que el Mariscal fijo el solar de la fabrica en un lugar apropiado, dirigio el diseno, envio a los constructores militares y resolvio los problemas que se presentaban en la construccion. 
					
					El orador senalo que todos deben acelerar la construccion de potencia deportiva en acato a las tareas programaticas presentadas en el VII Congreso del PTC bajo la guia del Mariscal y hacer aporte asi a ostentar a todo el mundo la dignidad y el honor de Corea del Juche. 
					
					Terminada la ceremonia de inauguracion, los participantes recorrieron la fabrica.
